componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
{{#if Recipient.FirstName}} Assalamu alaykum Dear {{Recipient.FirstName}}, {{else}} Assalamu alaykum {{/if}}

Your generosity last Ramadan humbled and overwhelmed us. You helped us to support a total of 245,034 people during Ramadan and Eid al-Fitr, a whole 43,725 more people than last year. May Allah accept your charity and reward you in abundance.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Messenger of Allah (PBUH) said: “Whoever gives iftar to one who is fasting will have a reward like his, without that detracting from the reward of the fasting person in the slightest.” (Al-Tirmidhi)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Download and explore our Ramadan 2021 feedback report in full and find out all the details of our Ramadan projects.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Feed the Fasting – in detail

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
You helped a staggering 178,627 people to break their fast across 10 countries. 21,535 families received a nutritious food parcel to feed the entire family for the whole month, 18,520 people received hot meals, and 21,558 people received cash vouchers for food.

When Eid al-Fitr came around, you supported 58,725 people with staple foods from your Zakat al-Fitr, and you provided 1,379 children with Eid gifts, spreading cheer and celebration on the blessed day of Eid.

We’re proud and touched that you entrusted your Ramadan charity to us, and we work hard to make sure that this Amanah is carried out ethically, transparently, and precisely as you intended.

Download our Ramadan 2021 feedback report and find our all about our Feed the Fasting campaign. 

Thank you for helping us to change lives in Ramadan. We couldn’t have done it without you.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Thank you,

JakaAllah khair
newsletter@humanappeal.org.uk
The Human Appeal Team
